definitions.definition: Alternative form of constructed language ( “ a human language consciously devised by an individual or a small group , as opposed to having naturally evolved as a natural language ” )
examples: The Klingon language is a conlang created for use in the Star Trek franchise.

main_definition: ( linguistics , colloquial ) Alternative form of constructed language ( “ a human language consciously devised by an individual or a small group , as opposed to having naturally evolved as a natural language ” ) [from 1990s]
